subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: James scored 43 points — 25 in a bewildering first-quarter shooting display — and Chris Bosh added 21, leading the Heat to a 100-96 win Tuesday night over the Cavaliers.
snippet: James scored 43 points — 25 in a bewildering first-quarter shooting display — and Chris Bosh added 21, leading the Heat to a 100-96 win Tuesday night over the Cavaliers.
